name: automatic-ifttt
description: Simple node.js app to trigger IFTTT Maker Channel event when Automatic reports low fuel for one of your vehicles.

AUTOMATIC_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Your Automatic access token. Get this from your Automatic at http://developer.automatic.com.

IFTTT_SECRET_KEY.description: Your IFTTT Maker Channel secret key. Get this from IFTTT at http://ifttt.com/maker.

FUEL_PERCENT_THRESHOLD.description: Your vehicle's fuel level percentage below which you'd like to trigger an IFTTT Maker Channel event.
